item.pixelpets.ability_reroll.tooltip1: This strange statue is able to bless pets
item.pixelpets.ability_reroll.tooltip2: Using it will reroll a pet's ability once
item.pixelpets.ability_reroll.tooltip3: You can get rare abilities with this!
ability.pixelpets.atropos_gift.descripti: Cats have 7 lives, why shouldn't you have another?
ability.pixelpets.atropos_gift.usage: When in hand, gives you absorption instead when you're about to die.
ability.pixelpets.feline_agility.usage: When used, gives you Speed effect.
ability.pixelpets.home_sweet_home.usage: When used, gives you Dolphin's Grace effect.
ability.pixelpets.lachesis_gift.usage: When in inventory, gives you extra hearts.
ability.pixelpets.lightweight.usage: When used, gives you Slow Falling effect.
ability.pixelpets.poseidons_gift.usage: When in inventory, gives you Water Breathing effect.
ability.pixelpets.prey.usage: When in inventory, gives you Speed effect when near hostile mobs.
ability.pixelpets.saturated.description: A well fed player is a happy player.
ability.pixelpets.saturated.usage: When used, gives you Saturation effect.
ability.pixelpets.scare_creepers.descrip: Go away ugly green exploding thing!
ability.pixelpets.scare_creepers.usage: When in inventory, Creepers will avoid you.
ability.pixelpets.builtin/sleep.usage: When used, you can sleep anywhere.
advancements.goddess_statue.title: Blessed
advancements.pixelpets.title: Pocket-sized Pals
